document.full_text: here's something you may have missed amid all the hoopla about warren buffett's lubrizol buyout: the "oracle of omaha" is now a baron of the global chemical industry.
document.title: with lubrizol, buffett a chemical industry baron
lines_and_colors: here's something you may have missed amid all the hoopla about warren buffett's lubrizol buyout: the "oracle of omaha" is now a baron of the global chemical industry.
